name: Leap Quest (PC)
description:
Leap quest is a one-click endless platformer game. In this game you have to jump over blocks to get maximum score. Your score will be uploaded to an online leaderboard.

Collect power ups along your way and upgrade them to make them last longer. Choose your character that will be your mate throughout the run. 

Controls :

Press Spacebar on your keyboard to jump. That's it. That's the controls.

Features :
  • Endlessness
  • Online leaderboard
  • Profile - Shows stats
  • 10 unique characters to purchase with in-game currency
  • Vibrant art style
  • Parallax Background
  • 3 kinds of powerups : Shield, Score Booster and Coin Doubler
